snippet: After suffering years of domestic abuse and drug addiction, Sylvia Anderson hopes that sharing her story will inspire others to transcend such circumstances.
abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, one of the seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provided Sylvia Anderson, who suffered years of domestic abuse and drug addiction, grant of $563 to pay her electricity bill.
lead_paragraph: After suffering years of domestic abuse and drug addiction, Sylvia Anderson hopes that sharing her story will inspire others to transcend such circumstances.

headline.print_headline: Telling a Dark Story to Offer Some Light
headline.main: Telling a Dark Story to Offer Some Light
